about.description:
DuckDB is an embedded database designed to execute analytical SQL queries
fast while embedded in another process. It is designed to be easy to
install and easy to use.

name: duckdb-split

about.description:
DuckDB is an embedded database designed to execute analytical SQL queries
fast while embedded in another process. It is designed to be easy to
install and easy to use.

DuckDB is an embedded database designed to execute analytical SQL queries
fast while embedded in another process. It is designed to be easy to
install and easy to use.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "duckdb" %}
{% set version = "1.0.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}-split
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  # (!!) Please also update the git used for OVERRIDE_GIT_DESCRIBE in the build scripts.
  url: https://github.com/duckdb/duckdb/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 04e472e646f5cadd0a3f877a143610674b0d2bcf9f4102203ac3c3d02f1c5f26
  patches:
    - 0001-Dynamically-link-the-cli.patch
    - 0001-Remove-code-signature-before-applying-metadata-to-ex.patch

build:
  number: 1
  skip: true  # [win or ppc64le]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - ninja
  host:
    - openssl

outputs:
  - name: libduckdb
    script: install-lib.sh
    build:
      run_exports:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
      host:
        - openssl
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libduckdb${SHLIB_EXT}
  - name: libduckdb-devel
    script: install-headers.sh
    build:
      run_exports:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/include/duckdb.h
  - name: duckdb-cli
    script: install-cli.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - duckdb -version
  - name: duckdb-extension-json
    script: install-extension.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
          - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-httpfs
    script: install-extension.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
        - openssl
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
          - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-autocomplete
    script: install-extension.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
          - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-fts
    script: install-extension.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
          - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-icu
    script: install-extension.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
          - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-inet
    script: install-extension.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
          - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-tpcds
    script: install-extension.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
          - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-tpch
    script: install-extension.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
          - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq

about:
  home: https://www.duckdb.org/
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: An Embeddable Analytical Database
  description: |
    DuckDB is an embedded database designed to execute analytical SQL queries
    fast while embedded in another process. It is designed to be easy to
    install and easy to use.
  doc_url: https://duckdb.org/docs/index.html
  dev_url: https://github.com/duckdb/duckdb

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - xhochy
    - janjagusch
